itunes:author: U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee
itunes:summary: Meet Cody Miller, an Olympic gold medalist in swimming. Cody reflects on his gold medal journey at the Olympic Games Rio 2016 and how his mindset has changed over time. He shares the his difficulties training for a postponed Olympic Games in 2021 amidst a global pandemic. Sasha and Cody discuss the struggles athletes face in finding themselves after the emotional rollercoaster of an Olympics. Cody explains how he's turned his passion for editing into a career as a vlogger to support his Olympic dreams and growing family.
